This is Jon Pelc. A web developer in Birmingham, AL with a passion for creating digital solutions to interactive problems and an undying craving for New York style pizza.

My Work

Addux Online

A desktop focused subscription based web app built to supplement a proprietary business strategy system developed by Cypress Resources. Features include user authentication system and Stripe API integration. I was the sole developer of this project and responsible for implementing the full stack and project deployment.

Skills: Javascript, HTML, CSS, React, Express, MongoDB, Node, Sass, Webpack, Babel, Heroku

Live Project Repository

Country Club Landing Page

The front end implmentation of a country club's landing page. I was supplied with a photoshop file and tasked with extracting the needed images and textures and using my judgement to make any necessary responsive changes. This project was originally part of a job interview in early 2016. I revisted it in order to see how my skills have grown and to attempt to refine my personal development flow.

Skills: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Sass, Webpack, Babel

Live Project Repository

Wait. Who is Jon Pelc?

I'm that guy in the picture! I'm a web developer who found his way to Birmingham, AL via northern New Jersey, Boston, and then Atlanta.

I have the skills to handle both front and back-end work (predominantly in Javascript) but I get really excited about working on the front end side of things. That's because I love building things that people enjoy interacting with. It's what drives me to do the work that I do. Right now I'm focusing on using React within the MERN stack but I'm always looking for excuses to add new tools to my repertoire. So if you've got one let me know!

When I'm not coding I like to team up with my girlfriend to spoil our 10 pound Boston Terrier Violet, invest too much time rooting for the Yankees and 49ers, playing video games with friends back up north, and desperately hunting for thin crust pizza while eating at all the great restaurants in the Birmingham area.

If you're curious about any of the above, have any potential project ideas, or want to hire me feel free to check out my stuff or get in touch with me via any of the links below.
